name: Background image template
format:
<style>
    body {
        background-image: url("/white.png");
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 100% 100%;
        background-size: 100%;
    }
</style>

name: transperent group status
format:
<style>
    #Chair_status_cards{
        background-color:#12345600;
    }
    #Chair_status{
        background-color:#12345600;
        border:none;
    }
</style>
<script>
function updateContainerStyle (el) {
	el = el.parentElement
	if (el && el.classList.contains('nr-dashboard-template')) {
	    // uncomment next line to make the parent container transparent
		el.style.backgroundColor = "#12345600"
	}
}

updateContainerStyle(document.getElementById("div-in-template"))
</script>

name: transperent group spacer
format:
<style>
    #Chair_spacer_cards{
        background-color:#12345600;
    }
    #Chair_spacer{

        border:none;
    }

        text-align:center;
    }

    }
    #Chair_status_cards{

    }
    #Chair_status{

</style>
<script>

	    // uncomment next line to make the parent container transparent
